atk-abh03a33:2_1: Idāni manussalokakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tathāgato loke, jāto loke saṁvaḍḍho,
atk-abh03a33:2_2: lokaṁ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenā’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a33:2_3: 3.94) suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘bhagavā tusitabhavane nibbatto tattheva vasati, na manussalokaṁ āgacchati,
atk-abh03a33:2_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:2_7: Atha naṁ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca saññāpetuṁ nanu atthītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:2_8: Loke jātoti paravādī tusitapuraṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a33:2_9: Satthārā panetaṁ manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:2_10: Lokaṁ abhibhuyyāti paravādī manussalokaṁ abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati,
atk-abh03a33:2_12: Anupalitto lokenāti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṁva sandhāya vadati,
atk-abh03a33:2_13: satthā pana lokadhammesu kilesehi anupalitto vihāsi. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a33:5_2: Tattha ‘‘tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya abhinimmitaṁ pesesi,
atk-abh03a33:5_3: tena ceva tassa ca desanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena dhammo desito,
atk-abh03a33:5_4: na buddhena bhagavatā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi vetullakānaññeva;
atk-abh03a33:5_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:5_7: sveva satthā bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ abhinimmito jinotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:5_8: Itaro tathā asampaṭicchanto paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a33:8_1: Tattha piyāyitānaṁ vatthūnaṁ vipattiyā sarāgānaṁ rāgavasena karuṇāpatirūpikaṁ pavattiṁ disvā ‘‘rāgova karuṇā nāma, so ca bhagavato natthi,
atk-abh03a33:8_2: tasmā natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a33:8_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:8_4: Atha naṁ ‘‘karuṇā nāmesā nikkilesatāya ceva sattārammaṇatāya ca cetovimuttitāya ca ekādasānisaṁsatāya ca mettādīhi samānajātikā,
atk-abh03a33:8_6: mettādayopissa na siyu’’nti codanatthaṁ natthi buddhassa bhagavato mettātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:8_7: Ākāruṇikoti pañhe tathārūpaṁ vohāraṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a33:11_2: Tattha yesaṁ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena ‘‘bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a33:11_3: natthi tato ca sugandhataraṁ gandhajāta’’nti laddhi,
atk-abh03a33:11_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:14_2: Tattha yesaṁ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavaseneva ‘‘bhagavā sotāpanno hutvā sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmī hutvā anāgāmī,
atk-abh03a33:14_4: ekeneva pana ariyamaggena cattāri phalāni sacchākāsī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a33:14_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:14_6: Atha naṁ catūhi phalehi saddhiṁ uppannānaṁ catunnaṁ phassādīnaṁ ekato samodhānavasena codetuṁ catunnaṁ phassānantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:14_8: Arahattamaggenāti ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṁ pahānābhāvavasena codeti.
atk-abh03a33:14_9: Bhagavā sotāpannoti buddhabhūtassa sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a33:17_1: Idāni jhānasaṅkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘idha, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a33:17_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati,
atk-abh03a33:17_3: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ,
atk-abh03a33:17_5: 5.923-934) imaṁ paṭipāṭidesanaṁ nissāya ‘‘tassa tassa jhānassa upacārappavattiṁ vināva jhānā jhānaṁ saṅkamatī’’ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a33:17_7: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:17_8: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṁ appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati, paṭhamato tatiyaṁ,
atk-abh03a33:17_9: dutiyato catutthampi saṅkameyyā’’ti codetuṁ paṭhamā jhānātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a33:17_13: Kāme ādīnavatoti paṭhamaṁ kāme ādīnavato manasi karoto pacchā uppajjati.
atk-abh03a33:17_15: Taññeva paṭhamanti ‘‘yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṁ viya anantaraṁ uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a33:17_16: ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṁ lakkhaṇato taññeva taṁ bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a33:17_18: Vivicceva kāmehītiādīhi paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṁ desitabhāvaṁ dīpeti, na anantaruppattiṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a33:20_2: Tattha yesaṁ samaye ‘‘pañcakanaye pañca jhānāni vibhattāni,
atk-abh03a33:20_3: kevalaṁ tayo samādhī uddiṭṭhā’’ti avitakkavicāramattassa samādhino okāsaṁ ajānantānaṁ ‘‘paṭhamassa ca dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma esā’’ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a33:20_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:21_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassāti ‘‘yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a33:21_3: So kevalaṁ laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a33:22_0: 819.Savitakko savicārotiādi ‘‘tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṁ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko,
atk-abh03a33:22_1: na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:23_1: Itaro ‘‘tesaṁ paccuppannānaṁyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma hotī’’ti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a33:23_2: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhanti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṁ ekakkhaṇe pavatti na yuttāti paṭijānāti .
atk-abh03a33:23_3: Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṁ jhānanti catukkanayavasena pucchati.
atk-abh03a33:23_4: Sakavādī tasmiṁ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a33:23_5: Nanu tayo samādhīti etthāyamadhippāyo – yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva, na jhānantarikā,
atk-abh03a33:23_6: evaṁ itarenapi jhāneneva bhavitabbaṁ, na jhānantarikāyāti.
atk-abh03a33:26_1: Idāni samāpanno saddaṁ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a33:26_2: Tattha ‘‘yasmā paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā,
atk-abh03a33:26_3: yadi ca samāpanno taṁ na suṇeyya, kathaṁ kaṇḍako siyā. Tasmā samāpanno saddaṁ, suṇātī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ;
atk-abh03a33:26_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:26_5: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatītiādi ‘‘samāpannassa tāva pañcadvārappavattaṁ natthi,
atk-abh03a33:26_6: tasmiṁ asati yadi so saddaṁ suṇeyya,
atk-abh03a33:26_9: Oḷārikena hi saddena sote ghaṭṭite paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tenetaṁ vuttaṁ, tasmā asādhakaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:26_10: Dutiyassa jhānassātiādi ‘‘yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṁ natthi,
atk-abh03a33:26_11: evaṁ saddassavanampī’’ti bodhanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a33:29_1: Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a33:29_2: Tattha ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā’’ti vacanaṁ nissāya ‘‘pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṁ passatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṁ ,
atk-abh03a33:29_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a33:29_5: rūpena rūpaṁ passeyyātī’’ti codetuṁ rūpena rūpaṁ passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a33:29_6: Itaro rūpāyatanaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho cakkhumeva sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a33:29_7: Paṭivijānātīti ettha ayamadhippāyo – passatīti hi mayaṁ paṭijānanaṁ sandhāya pucchāma, na cakkhūpasaṁhāramattaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:29_8: Tasmā vadehi tāva ‘‘kiṁ te cakkhumā rūpena rūpaṁ paṭivijānātī’’ti.
atk-abh03a33:29_9: Itaro purimanayeneva paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a33:29_10: Atha naṁ ‘‘evaṁ sante rūpaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a33:29_11: tañhi paṭivijānāti nāmā’’ti codetuṁ rūpaṁ manoviññāṇanti āha.
atk-abh03a33:29_13: Atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanātiādi ‘‘yadi cakkhu paṭivijānanaṭṭhena passati,
atk-abh03a33:29_14: cakkhuviññāṇassa viya tassāpi āvajjanāya bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a33:29_18: Sotena saddantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a33:29_19: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatīti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a33:29_20: Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi ‘‘dhanunā vijjhatī’’ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a33:29_21: evaṁ cakkhuviññāṇena passantopi ‘‘cakkhunā passatī’’ti vutto, tasmā asādhakametaṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayopi.
